patch.name: patch
patch.title: CiviCRM Patch Available
patch.message:
The site is running 5.12.0. Additional patches are available:

  • 5.12.1 (2019-04-15): Fix regression involving dedupe. Restore default menu color and allow customization.
  • 5.12.2 (2019-04-19): Fix regressions involving menu presentation, contact dashboard, and mailing preview.
  • 5.12.3 (2019-04-20): Fix regression involving "Find Pledges".
  • 5.12.4 (2019-04-25): Fix regression involving CiviMail previews. Fix new installer diagnostic.

upgrade.name: upgrade
upgrade.title: CiviCRM Upgrade Available
upgrade.message: 5.13.0 was released on 2019-05-01. The latest patch revision is 5.13.4 (2019-05-15).
